item.title: Introduction to Microservices with Nameko
item.description:
Description

An introductory overview of the microservice pattern for web applications, made concrete with working examples using Nameko.
item.dc:creator: Thomas Peterson

item.title: Improving Your Flask APIs
item.description:
Description

We'll take a look at the flask-restful and flask-restful-swagger packages and how they can be used to make your APIs simpler, cleaner, well-documented, and easier to extend.
item.dc:creator: Thomas Peterson
